Class ElectronicSecuredNotepad

java.lang.Object
SimpleNotepad
SecuredNotepad
ElectronicSecuredNotepad
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElectronicDevice, Notepad
public class ElectronicSecuredNotepad extends SecuredNotepad implements ElectronicDevice
This class represents electronic secured notepad. This class extends SecuredNotepad and implements interface IElectronicDevice. Each method invokes the related super method from the parent class.

    • createPage

      public void createPage(String title, String text)
      This method create new page with title and text. First it checks if the device is started. If true then the method invokes the super method from the parent class.
      Specified by:
      createPage in interface Notepad
      Overrides:
      createPage in class SecuredNotepad
      Parameters:
      title - defines the page title
      text - defines the page text

    • replaceText

      public void replaceText(int pageNumber, String text) throws NoPageFoundException
      This method replace the whole text in the given page number. It calls the super method from the parent class. First it checks if the device is started. If it is true, then the method is executed.
      Specified by:
      replaceText in interface Notepad
      Overrides:
      replaceText in class SecuredNotepad
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - defines which specific page will be affected.
      text - defines the new text.
      Throws:
      NoPageFoundException - this method can throw an exception (checked) if the defined page number is not found.

    • deleteText

      public void deleteText(int pageNumber) throws NoPageFoundException
      This method deletes the text from the defined page. First, it checks if the device is started. If true invokes the related super method from the parent class.
      Specified by:
      deleteText in interface Notepad
      Overrides:
      deleteText in class SecuredNotepad
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - defines the page number where text to be deleted.
      Throws:
      NoPageFoundException - it throws (checked) exception if the specified page number is not found.

    • previewAllPages

      public void previewAllPages()
      This method preview all pages from the notebook. First, it checks if the device is started. If true invokes the related super method from the parent class. The result is printed in the console.
      Specified by:
      previewAllPages in interface Notepad
      Overrides:
      previewAllPages in class SecuredNotepad
